A maximális hatékonyság érdekében helyezze a ventilátort a tűzhely tetejére, hogy a "hűtőbordákon" keresztül hűvös levegő áramoljon be. items.raw_desc: Matcha szett Matcha Tea Profi készlet, Isamu:The Matcha Tea Isamu pro set allows you to enjoy the traditional Japanese tea ceremony. Includes a chawan tea bowl, a bamboo chashak spoon and a bamboo chasen whisk to easily prepare matcha tea. You put the ground matcha tea into a chawan tea bowl with a spoon and then gradually pour 70° water over it. Whisk the tea with a whisk until it becomes a thick foam. You can prepare a milder version of usucha tea, for this use 2 teaspoons per 70 ml of water and stir the tea in an M-shape. For a stronger koicha tea, pour 3-4 teaspoons of 40 ml of water. Then stir the tea in a gentle circular motion.
